shortDescription: High-quality cricket bat with lightweight design.
longDescription: This professional-grade cricket bat is designed for both performance and durability. Its lightweight construction allows for faster shots, while the solid grip ensures maximum control. Whether you're a professional or amateur, this bat will take your game to the next level. Crafted with premium wood for optimal power and precision, it guarantees an outstanding performance.

shortDescription: Durable tennis ball for all court types.
longDescription: This high-performance tennis ball is built for all types of courts, providing consistent bounce and durability. It is designed with a high-quality rubber core and a felt cover to ensure long-lasting performance during both practice and matches. Whether you're an amateur or a professional, this tennis ball delivers excellent control and speed.

shortDescription: Comfortable running shoes with excellent grip.
longDescription: These running shoes offer supreme comfort, support, and durability for athletes and fitness enthusiasts. Designed with breathable mesh and advanced cushioning, they provide a soft feel with every stride. The non-slip sole ensures excellent grip, making them ideal for running on both outdoor and indoor tracks. With their lightweight construction and stylish design, these shoes are perfect for any workout or casual outing.

shortDescription: Lightweight racket with strong strings.
longDescription: This lightweight badminton racket is perfect for players of all levels. The racket is constructed with durable materials and features strong strings that provide great tension for precise shots. Whether you're playing recreationally or competitively, this racket offers excellent control and stability, making it a great choice for any badminton enthusiast.

shortDescription: Adjustable weight dumbbell set for workouts.
longDescription: This adjustable dumbbell set is perfect for home workouts or fitness enthusiasts looking to build strength. The set comes with a variety of weight options, allowing you to tailor your workout intensity. The ergonomic grips provide a secure and comfortable hold, while the durable material ensures long-lasting use.

shortDescription: Double stitching for extra durability.
longDescription: This complete boxing set includes gloves, hand wraps, and a punching bag designed for intense workouts. The durable material with double stitching ensures the set can withstand regular use. Ideal for beginners or seasoned boxers, this set enhances training sessions and provides protection during practice.

shortDescription: Classic and oh-so-dreamy. A boost of nutrition.
longDescription: This delicious vanilla protein shake is designed to fuel your workouts and support your muscle recovery. With 30 grams of protein per serving, it provides the essential nutrients your body needs to repair and build muscle after exercise. The creamy vanilla flavor makes it a tasty and convenient way to meet your protein goals.

shortDescription: Strut your sporty stuff in style.
longDescription: This customizable sports apparel collection lets you design your activewear to match your personality and style. From personalized jerseys to gym wear, you can choose your fabric, size, and design. Perfect for teams, athletes, or anyone who wants to look stylish while staying active. Durable, comfortable, and unique to you.
customization: Any size and design you like.

shortDescription: Color-coded resistance bands for strength training.
longDescription: This resistance band set offers a wide range of training options for muscle building and physical therapy. The set includes five different levels of resistance bands, made from durable, high-quality latex that withstands regular use without snapping or tearing. Whether you're working on improving flexibility, rehabilitation, or full-body workouts, this set is ideal for enhancing your fitness routine.

shortDescription: Non-slip yoga mat with carrying strap.
longDescription: This eco-friendly, non-slip yoga mat offers superior cushioning for joint support during yoga or other floor exercises. The textured surface provides optimal grip, ensuring stability during challenging poses. Made with lightweight and durable materials, it comes with a carrying strap for easy portability. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned yogi, this mat will enhance your workout experience.

shortDescription: Adjustable speed rope for cardio training.
longDescription: This speed jump rope is built for high-intensity cardio workouts and interval training. Its adjustable length allows customization for different heights, while the ergonomic handles ensure a firm grip, even during sweaty sessions. Perfect for boxers, athletes, and fitness enthusiasts looking to improve endurance, coordination, and agility.

shortDescription: Anti-fog swimming goggles with UV protection.
longDescription: These swimming goggles are designed with comfort and performance in mind. Featuring anti-fog lenses and UV protection, they provide clear vision in both indoor and outdoor pools. The adjustable straps ensure a secure fit for all head sizes, making them a great option for competitive swimmers and recreational swimmers alike.

shortDescription: Leather mitt for fastball catchers.
longDescription: Crafted from durable leather, this baseball mitt is designed specifically for fastball catchers. The mitt is flexible, yet sturdy enough to withstand high-speed throws. It offers an excellent grip and a deep pocket for improved catching performance. Ideal for both professional and amateur players.

shortDescription: Durable mountain bike with high performance.
longDescription: This mountain bike is built for rugged terrain and outdoor adventures. With its strong alloy frame and durable tires, it provides excellent stability and control on uneven surfaces. Whether you're cycling through trails or climbing steep hills, this bike ensures a smooth and comfortable ride.

shortDescription: Lightweight tennis racket with high tension strings.
longDescription: This lightweight tennis racket is designed for speed and precision. The high-tension strings provide excellent ball control, while the lightweight frame allows for quick swings. Perfect for players of all skill levels, this racket offers power and accuracy in every shot.

shortDescription: Durable basketball hoop with adjustable height.
longDescription: This basketball hoop features a sturdy steel frame and an adjustable height system, allowing you to customize the hoop height to suit players of all ages. It’s designed for both indoor and outdoor use, providing excellent bounce and durability for endless hours of fun.

shortDescription: Eco-friendly yoga mat with non-slip surface.
longDescription: This eco-friendly yoga mat is made from recycled materials and provides a non-slip surface for all yoga and fitness practices. It’s cushioned for comfort, durable, and easy to clean. Whether you're practicing yoga, pilates, or other fitness exercises, this mat provides the perfect support.

shortDescription: Smart watch with health monitoring features.
longDescription: This smart watch offers a range of features, including heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and fitness goal tracking. It syncs seamlessly with your smartphone, allowing you to receive notifications, calls, and messages directly on your wrist. With a sleek design and long battery life, it's perfect for staying connected and tracking your health.

shortDescription: Complete football kit for training and matches.
longDescription: This complete football kit includes a jersey, shorts, and socks, designed for comfort and performance. Made from breathable fabric, it ensures maximum mobility during matches and training sessions. The set is available in various colors, and its durable stitching ensures it can withstand intense activity.

shortDescription: Durable exercise ball for core strengthening.
longDescription: This exercise ball is designed to improve your balance, flexibility, and core strength. Made from anti-burst material, it provides a safe and stable surface for a variety of exercises. Whether you're using it for yoga, pilates, or strength training, this ball is a great addition to your fitness routine.

shortDescription: Adjustable jump rope for cardio and fitness.
longDescription: This adjustable jump rope is perfect for improving cardiovascular fitness and coordination. The lightweight, durable design makes it ideal for both beginners and seasoned athletes. With comfortable handles and a smooth rope, it offers a great workout experience, helping you burn calories and improve endurance.

shortDescription: Anti-fog swimming goggles with adjustable straps.
longDescription: These anti-fog swimming goggles are designed to give you a clear view while swimming. With a comfortable, adjustable strap, they fit securely and are perfect for both beginners and competitive swimmers. The ergonomic design ensures that they stay in place during dives and turns, making them the ideal choice for training or leisure swimming.
